home.newEra: The world's leading derivative digital asset exchange
home.perpetual_cont: World's first Futures Trading settled in stablecoins with up to 200x leverage The Tetherv futures trading is a fast and cost-effective option to trade digital currency
home.stablecoin_cont: Tetherv houses a strong Stablecoin eco-system A complete infrastructure including Stablecoin trading, payment, remittance Be part of the next global hub for high-quality Stablecoins
home.security_cont: Tetherv’s digital currency custody utilizes Ledger’s institutional vault system which is covered by ledger's insurance for up to 150 million USD Tetherv also leverages multi-signature cold wallet technology and more than 98% of the assets will be stored in the cold wallet
home.service_cont: Our customer support staff are available 24/7 across the globe Talk to us through live chat for any assistance
home.analy_cont: Traders can use various charting tools and indicators with our robust analytic functions on the trading page.
home.liquidity_cont: Get access to high liquidity across Tetherv's trading platforms 24/7
home.technology_cont: Tetherv’s time-tested technology is developed with industry expertise and ensures optimized functionalities
home.easy: Trade on the go Anywhere, anytime
